properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Behold the throne of grace! The promise calls me near: there Jesus shows a smiling face, and waits to answer prayer.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: That rich atoning blood, which sprinkled round we see, provides for those who come to God an all prevailing plea.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Beyond thy utmost wants his love and pow'r can bless; to praying souls he always grants more than they can express.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Since ’tis the Lord’s command, My mouth we'll open wide; Lord open Thou Thy bounteous hand, That we may be supplied.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Thine image, Lord, bestow, thy presence and thy love; We ask to serve thee here below, and reign with thee above.
